overview: HIT THE ROAD is SEVENTEEN's highly-anticipated first ever documentary series. It follows the thirteen members of the South Korean group along  their second world tour, ODE TO YOU, which took place over the last half of 2019 and start of 2020. As they travel through Asia and North America, the members of SEVENTEEN reveal a completely real side to themselves and disclose stories never told before.
title: SEVENTEEN: Hit The Road
